
==install Java SDK 6==
   $ sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jdk
   
   
==get hadoop-0.20.1==
 $ wget http://labs.xiaonei.com/apache-mirror/hadoop/core/hadoop-0.20.1/hadoop-0.20.1.tar.gz
 $ tar xzf hadoop-0.20.1.tar.gz
 
 
==install libpyhdfs==
  $ svn co http://libpyhdfs.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ libpyhdfs
  $ mkdir libpyhdfs/lib
  $ cd hadoop-0.20.1
  $ cp c++/Linux-i386-32/liblibhdfs.so.0 hadoop-0.20.1-core.jar commons-logging-1.0.4.jar ../libpyhdfs/lib
  $ cd ../libpyhdfs
  $ ln -s libhdfs.so.0 lib/libhdfs.so
  
  $ sudo python setup install --prefix=/usr/local


==Setting CLASSPATH==
   $ export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib/pyhdfs
   $ export CLASSPATH=/usr/local/lib/pyhdfs/hadoop-0.20.1-core.jar:/usr/loca/lib/pyhdfs/commons-logging-1.0.4.jar


==Run test script==
   $ cd test
   $ python pyhdfs_test.py
